# title

**Instance Property**

The title of the menu element.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var title: String { get }
```

## Getting the element attributes

- **subtitle**: The subtitle to display alongside the menu element’s title.
- **image**: The image to display alongside the menu element’s title.

items.description: The subtitle to display alongside the menu element’s title.
items.name: subtitle

items.description: The image to display alongside the menu element’s title.
items.name: image

title: title
